attributes.review: i got this app to know when the next rally was because i wanted to go to it but whenever i was looking it up it called me a racial slur and told me to go back to my country because i was not white 😡😡😡. it also made my phone glitch terribly and whenever i would go to my camera roll ALL my pictures were of THAT NASTY CHEETOS NUDES 🤢🤢. AND MY DOG WAS NEXT TO ME SO WHENEVER HE SAW THAT IT CAUSED HIM TO PASS AWAY 😔😔. rip cat destroyer you will be missed 😿. please do not get this app it also told me i was ugly and disgusting and to kill myself 😹.
attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP 😾😡.

attributes.review: I got this app as a thing to look for more political views but instead got a flashing orangutan on my screen every time I open the app. When I first opened the app it scared me so much my mom drove off the road into a ditch. This app has done nothing but make my life even worse. I now have medics bills that aren’t gonna be able to get paid since they are starting to take trans medical rights away. I will never use this app again
attributes.title: Glitching a big fat Oompa Loompa looking orangutan.

attributes.review: when I first opened the app there was a picture of this guy with his hand up in front of the American flag. I’ve never seen this man before but something about him didn’t sit right with me. And on top of that he had the AUDACITY to ask me for my phone number. #creep. Then all of a sudden the screen went black and a picture of this pig wearing a dress shows up while this song was playing. It kinda when like” SHWATY 🚺 LiKe tHe MelOdY 🎶 iN My hEaD🧠 tHaT i CanT kEep OuT 👉🏽 gOt me sInGin likE 👄
attributes.title: ⚠️WARNING MUST READ! TRAUMATIZING GLICHES

attributes.review: I wanted to get the app to support trump because I believe he is a great president and making good choices for our county, BUT when I opened the app, my tv turned on, and it hacked my tv to show pictures of trump saying that he should be our 2020 president!! Then it hacked into my iPad with the same things!! Then my electronic fridge, my electronic chairs, my electronic windows, and even, 😪 my ELECTRONIC BED!! I am so mad that it hacked my smart house!! I don’t understand why such a great guy would do such a thing. 😓🤥
attributes.title: Disgusting 😤

attributes.review: As soon as i downloaded this app i heard a banging on my front door... I immediately got up and opened my door to find Perez Hilton and Miranda Cooper lunging at me with large pitch forks! Miranda Cooper drop kicked me so that Perez Hilton could drag me into his 2008 Volkswagen Beetle by my left pinky toe. I screamed “HOW DID YOU FIND ME??” And was then informed by the driver (Tony Lopez) that the Trump app provided my worst enemies with my location. It was an extremely traumatic experience and I am still in the custody of Perez and Miranda. Please take this app off the store😭✨👄
attributes.title: AWFUL APP

attributes.review:
When you open the app it brings you to a page that says “Donald Trump despises 100 Gecs, and is in love with shane dawson.. i killed ryland” and from that moment i knew... this app was the worst decision i’ve made in the 15 years of my small little life.  I climbed out of my head And watched myself implode A thought without a body Ought to be a shot to take a load Off my brain is poisoned And I'm searching for the antidote But every time I find it My defenses scream, "Oh, no you don't!"
Woah
attributes.title: worst app to be made..ever..lol

attributes.review: It’s me, Nagito Komaeda. I got the app because I thought Junko would be on there. ‘Cause...ya’know... D̸͈͍͚̮̂͗̏͒͊́̒͑̾͠é̴̲̳͇͚̼͜ͅş̸̼̲͂̇̌̾p̴̩͍̗̭͉͙̦͍̓̋̾̔̍͌̀ą̵͕̹̤̫̫̂̓͘ͅi̸̬͇̗̝̻͗͒͐͜ͅͅr̶̛̠͖͇͌̈́͗̾͠... But, when I opened it, there was just Monokuma! He kept looking at the screen and laughing! And you will not believe what he said next. He said, “IT’S PUNISHMENT TIME FOR ALL MINORITIES!!!”. Wait, that wasn’t Monokuma? Guys, Hajime just told me that that wasn’t the psychotic bear? Wait, WHAT?!? Hajime just told me that that was the president of the United States of America... That can’t be true... I guess H҉o҉p҉e҉ really didn’t win...
attributes.title: It’s me, Nagito Komaeda on the DS

attributes.review: My phone was fine until i downloaded it and everything wouldnt work. I would be able to unlock it but from there nothing worked. It was like the touch screen broke. I tried everything including restarting it and taking it to apple. Apple said they couldnt do anything about it so i had to get a whole new phone. Im still in shock at the fact a simple app broke my phone. All i wanted to do was support our president
attributes.title: Broke my phone

attributes.review: This 👉 app 🤡 is 👄 so stupid 🙄🤬 and it made me 👈 want to throw up 🤢, so I did 🤮 and then my 👈 cat 🐈 ate it 🥘, which made him 🐈 throw up 🤮 and I had to take him 🐱 to the vet 🏥 and the doctor 👩‍⚕️ said that he 🐈 had gotten very sick 🤒 with corona 😷 and has now died 🙀 and I miss him 🐈 so much 💔😭 and it is all this apps 👉 fault. The Cheeto killed 🔫🔪💣 my cat ⚰️🐱 so now I 👈 am going to sue him 👉 and he 👉 is going to pay 💰 for my therapy 🤦‍♀️ and he 👈 has to send Obama ❤️ an invitation ✉️📬📃 to my cats 🐈 funeral ⚰️😭, and the pig 🐖 has to pay 💳💸💰💵 for it
attributes.title: Ew 🤮🤢

attributes.review: so I downloaded the app and it worked fine until my phone got completely ruined I got viruses everywhere I would go on a another app and tabs would open up, crazy songs would start playing and my screen almost peeled off absolutely dreadful app I don’t doubt that Hilary made the app and put her name as trump 🙄to my fellow supporters DO NOT download this unless you want major viruses im gonna have to get a whole new phone gee wilikers 🙄#settleforbid- er I mean #trump 🤠
attributes.title: proud trump supporter😻
